item.description:
Online, there is so much talk about demons and evil.  Are there demons?  If so, what can we do about them?  Is there evil?  Or is it simply something we have created in our thought patterns? 

Come for a discussion and some information in regards to these things.  Learn some tools to use when in the presence of spirits and physical people who make you uncomfortable. 

Bring some Thanksgiving leftovers to share with four other people!  :o)

There will be no meetup in December.
item.how_to_find_us: come in at the upper porch level
item.name: Are there bad spirits? Is there evil?
